title: Erica

|   |                                                                                                                                                    |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A wild-tempered adventuress. She's quite prideful for an octopode, and brandishes their venomous capacity and camouflage talents with cruel force. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Location](#Location)
- [3 Spells](#Spells)
- [4 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [5 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Erica the Fiery-Tempered** is a [unique](/Unique "Unique") caster of destructive and disabling magic. She wields a [flaming](/Flaming "Flaming") [scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar"), but prefers to fight from a distance while invisible. Also, she always spawns with a [ring](/Ring "Ring").

## Location

- [The Dungeon](/The_Dungeon "The Dungeon"):8-11
- The [Orcish Mines](/Orcish_Mines "Orcish Mines"):1
- [The Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair"):1-2

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                               |                                                     |
| :---------- | --------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Venom Bolt](/Venom_Bolt "Venom Bolt") (3d14) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility")  | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Slow](/Slow "Slow")                          | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- [Poison resistance](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"), [Repel Missiles](/Repel_Missiles "Repel Missiles"), [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible"), and high [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") will counter most of her spells, but that's a lot to ask for. She's flimsy, so a strong offense that takes her out quickly may be the best defense.
- Her mediocre [hit dice](/Hit_dice "Hit dice") and lack of poison resistance make her susceptible to [Mephitic Cloud](/Mephitic_Cloud "Mephitic Cloud").
- Erica is commonly encountered in [the Lair](/The_Lair "The Lair"). If you already have some skill in [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades"), her flaming scimitar is a good choice for fighting the [hydras](/Hydra "Hydra") you'll find there.

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), she will have less Will (60 -> 40) and EV (14 -> 13). Also, her melee attacks will be nerfed: 15 -> 11 and 4 -> 3.
- Prior to [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), Erica was a human. She had less EV and a weaker melee attack, but could cast Force Lance (3d13) and Confuse.
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), Erica had [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast") instead of [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance").
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), she could also cast [Teleport Self](/Teleport_Self "Teleport Self").

Erica

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Erica x 
HP 41-84
HD 9
XP 836
Speed 10
AC 0
EV 14
Will 60
Attack1 15 (hit: plain)
Attack2 4 (constrict: crush)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Amphibious
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type octopode, octopode
Flags Speaks
Warm-blooded
Unique
Female
No skeleton
A wild-tempered adventuress. She's quite prideful for an octopode, and brandishes their venomous capacity and camouflage talents with cruel force.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Location
  • 3 Spells
  • 4 Tips & Tricks
  • 5 History

Useful Info

Erica the Fiery-Tempered is a unique caster of destructive and disabling magic. She wields a flaming scimitar, but prefers to fight from a distance while invisible. Also, she always spawns with a ring.

Location

  • The Dungeon:8-11
  • The Orcish Mines:1
  • The Lair:1-2

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Venom Bolt (3d14) Wizard flag
Slot2 Invisibility Wizard flag
Slot3 Slow Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Poison resistance, Repel Missiles, see invisible, and high willpower will counter most of her spells, but that's a lot to ask for. She's flimsy, so a strong offense that takes her out quickly may be the best defense.
  • Her mediocre hit dice and lack of poison resistance make her susceptible to Mephitic Cloud.
  • Erica is commonly encountered in the Lair. If you already have some skill in Long Blades, her flaming scimitar is a good choice for fighting the hydras you'll find there.

History

  • In 0.32, she will have less Will (60 -> 40) and EV (14 -> 13). Also, her melee attacks will be nerfed: 15 -> 11 and 4 -> 3.
  • Prior to 0.31, Erica was a human. She had less EV and a weaker melee attack, but could cast Force Lance (3d13) and Confuse.
  • Prior to 0.25, Erica had Iskenderun's Mystic Blast instead of Force Lance.
  • Prior to 0.17, she could also cast Teleport Self.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Erica&oldid=79161"

{{version031}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Erica the Fiery-Tempered''' is a [[unique]] caster of destructive and disabling magic. She wields a [[flaming]] [[scimitar]], but prefers to fight from a distance while invisible. Also, she always spawns with a [[ring]].

==Location==
*[[The Dungeon]]:8-11
*The [[Orcish Mines]]:1
*[[The Lair]]:1-2

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*[[Poison resistance]], [[Repel Missiles]], [[see invisible]], and high [[willpower]] will counter most of her spells, but that's a lot to ask for. She's flimsy, so a strong offense that takes her out quickly may be the best defense.
*Her mediocre [[hit dice]] and lack of poison resistance make her susceptible to [[Mephitic Cloud]].
*Erica is commonly encountered in [[the Lair]]. If you already have some skill in [[Long Blades]], her flaming scimitar is a good choice for fighting the [[hydra]]s you'll find there.

==History==
{{CBA|0.32|she will have less Will (60 -> 40) and EV (14 -> 13). Also, her melee attacks will be nerfed: 15 -> 11 and 4 -> 3.}}
*Prior to [[0.31]], Erica was a human. She had less EV and a weaker melee attack, but could cast Force Lance (3d13) and Confuse.
*Prior to [[0.25]], Erica had [[Iskenderun's Mystic Blast]] instead of [[Force Lance]].
*Prior to [[0.17]], she could also cast [[Teleport Self]].

[[Category:Human]]
